data.name: Evade The Taxman
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT MY OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1814520/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1749940


About the Game



Evade The Taxman is a frightening singleplayer survival horror game where you have to pay your dues to the taxman.

The goal is to make it out alive. For that you have to find and collect a certain amount of bills spread randomly over specific areas.
Then once you have all the bills, you need to run to the exit.

The longer you wait, the more impatient the taxman gets.
You can throw him your bills. That will soothe him maybe. Don't ask how you will get out without the bills.

The more money you have, the more he will go after you.
(also he will come even if you have no money because of course he will).

You cannot hide - Don't even think about it.

Other Features :
- You can throw the bills away if you don't want them. You are a generous soul.
- It can be used to distract the taxman.
- It can be used to interact with certain objects. No guarantee it will work. No guarantee you'll get your money back.
- footsteps. You'll hear a lot of footsteps.
- the world is made of a variety of closed and open spaces. And yes there are toilets.
